mapper.select: select MAJ_CODE, RESC_KEY, MAJ_CODE_NAME, MAJ_CODE_DESC, USE_INDC from cm001c
mapper.insert: insert into cm001c(MAJ_CODE, RESC_KEY, MAJ_CODE_NAME, MAJ_CODE_DESC, USE_INDC) values (#{majCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{rescKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{majCodeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{majCodeDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{useIndc,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
